text: I had a great experience with lockandstore. Ms Xunling was responsive, helpful, and made the entire process smooth. The storage space was clean, secure, and exactly what I needed. I especially appreciated and the clear communication throughout. Highly recommended for anyone looking for reliable storage solutions!

excellent service! a few days ago, i communicated via email and phone with ms wendy, who was very friendly and helpful, and we arranged the viewing of a storage unit according to my needs at the branch of my choosing. today, i was greeted by another super friendly, helpful and professional staff, ms salina, who showed me around and carefully explained everything. i saw the unit, signed the contract and got my storage space. everything was done in less than 20min. amazing! i highly recommend lock+store to anyone in need of some extra space to keep their belongings

Clean and quiet warehouse, away from the hustle and bustle of the usual Geylang crowd. About 5 to 10 mins walk from Aljunied MRT.

Staff is friendly and always flexible. Always ready to lend a helping hand if our things are a little too heavy to carry.
Excellent service by Delvin and Wendy. Patience and friendly. Garreful for showing me the place and attend to my enquiries!!
